content: these cozy crochet boots with flip flops for soles might just convince you that flip flops are not just for summer anymore the pattern and tutorials will teach you how to transform a cheap pair of flip flops into sweater boots that look just like the expensive store-bought shoes whether you wear them outside as boots or inside as slippers you re going to have some incredibly warm stylish and happy toes the pattern includes a printable ruler to guide the placement of holes pokes on your flip flop soles this is essential in easily meeting the pattern gauge and ensuring your boots fit crocheting your own shoes is so fun and will make you feel like a diy rock star this ad-free printable pdf includes a written pattern photo tutorial and a link to the step-by-step video tutorial this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - intermediate sizing pattern works well to crochet boots in women s shoe size 6 and up details are given for each shoe size * see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading -
